content: a friend of mine over at lenovo just sent me this coupon for a sale starting at Lenovo on May 19th to May 25th The coupon is suppose to be for military use only but I dont think they check some of the Thinkpads are military spec so would be useful for traveling Sales start 19th ends 25th · ThinkPad laptops - 15% off · IdeaPad laptops - 10% off Use coupon code USPMILITARY at checkout Hot links are prohibited by TOS does not include S10 and G530 everything else is fine This message has been edited.
